title: How to Make Dr. Pepper Ice Cream

steps.headline: Pour the soda, condensed milk, and half and half into an ice cream machine.
Add the ice and rock salt around the sides.
steps.description: Sprinkle enough over the edges of the ice cream machine. Pat down enough ice cubes to keep the ice cream cold and frozen.

steps.headline: Put the ice cream machine on and blend until creamy.
steps.description: Following your ice cream machine's instructions, mix the ice cream for about 15-30 minutes until the consistency resembles ice cream.

steps.headline: Scoop the ice cream out and into serving bowls.
Serve.
steps.description: Garnish the Dr. Pepper ice cream with whipped cream and a cherry on top, if desired. Enjoy!

steps.headline: Beat the whipping cream with an electric mixer for about 2-3 minutes.
steps.description: Mix well until peaks begin to form.

steps.headline: Boil the soda over high heat in a saucepan.
steps.description: Boil the Dr. Pepper for about 10-15 minutes and whisk constantly. Once done, set aside and cool for about 5 minutes.

steps.headline: Combine all the ingredients into a large bowl.
steps.description: Mix the Dr. Pepper, whipped cream, coconut syrup, and lime juice together with a rubber spatula until fully incorporated.

steps.headline: Scrape the ice cream into a freezer-proof container.
Freeze the ice cream for 6 hours till overnight until solid.
Serve.
steps.description: Scoop the ice cream out and into serving bowls. Garnish the Dr. Pepper ice cream with whipped cream and a cherry on top, if desired. Enjoy!

text: Using an Ice Cream Maker Pour the soda, condensed milk, and half and half into an ice cream machine.  Add the ice and rock salt around the sides. Sprinkle enough over the edges of the ice cream machine. Pat down enough ice cubes to keep the ice cream cold and frozen. Put the ice cream machine on and blend until creamy. Following your ice cream machine's instructions, mix the ice cream for about 15-30 minutes until the consistency resembles ice cream. Scoop the ice cream out and into serving bowls.  Serve. Garnish the Dr. Pepper ice cream with whipped cream and a cherry on top, if desired. Enjoy! Using a Freezer Beat the whipping cream with an electric mixer for about 2-3 minutes. Mix well until peaks begin to form. Boil the soda over high heat in a saucepan. Boil the Dr. Pepper for about 10-15 minutes and whisk constantly. Once done, set aside and cool for about 5 minutes. Combine all the ingredients into a large bowl. Mix the Dr. Pepper, whipped cream, coconut syrup, and lime juice together with a rubber spatula until fully incorporated. Scrape the ice cream into a freezer-proof container. Close tightly with a lid. Freeze the ice cream for 6 hours till overnight until solid.  Serve. Scoop the ice cream out and into serving bowls. Garnish the Dr. Pepper ice cream with whipped cream and a cherry on top, if desired. Enjoy!
sentences: Using an Ice Cream Maker Pour the soda, condensed milk, and half and half into an ice cream machine.
Add the ice and rock salt around the sides.
Sprinkle enough over the edges of the ice cream machine.
Pat down enough ice cubes to keep the ice cream cold and frozen.
Put the ice cream machine on and blend until creamy.
Following your ice cream machine's instructions, mix the ice cream for about 15-30 minutes until the consistency resembles ice cream.
Scoop the ice cream out and into serving bowls.

Garnish the Dr. Pepper ice cream with whipped cream and a cherry on top, if desired.

Using a Freezer Beat the whipping cream with an electric mixer for about 2-3 minutes.
Mix well until peaks begin to form.
Boil the soda over high heat in a saucepan.
Boil the Dr. Pepper for about 10-15 minutes and whisk constantly.
Once done, set aside and cool for about 5 minutes.
Combine all the ingredients into a large bowl.
Mix the Dr. Pepper, whipped cream, coconut syrup, and lime juice together with a rubber spatula until fully incorporated.
Scrape the ice cream into a freezer-proof container.
Close tightly with a lid.
Freeze the ice cream for 6 hours till overnight until solid.
Serve.
Scoop the ice cream out and into serving bowls.
Garnish the Dr. Pepper ice cream with whipped cream and a cherry on top, if desired.
Enjoy!
